problem_text_cn: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线m、n与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．若AB=3．BC=5,DF=12,则DE的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, the straight line, n and the three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively. If AB = N_0. BC = N_1, DF = N_2, then the value of DE is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线的性质,熟练掌握平行线分线段成比例是解题的关键
